original: dzam bha la s'a dha nam /
analyzed: dzam bha la s'a dha nam /

original: @239a * // dzam bha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @239a * // dzam bha la la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /

original: nyi ma la dzam yig las skyes pa'i dzam bha la ser po zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa mi bskyod pas ral pa'i cod pan can /
analyzed: nyi ma la dzam yig las skyes pa'i dzam bha la ser po zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa mi bskyod pas ral pa'i cod pan can /
translated: from a sun and the syllable jam, one should generate yellow Jambhala with three faces, six arms, and a crown of hair with Ak·π£obhya.

original: phyag g-yas pa gsum na ma tu lung ga dag dang lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa ;
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gsum na ma tu lung ga dag dang lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa ;
translated: In the three right hands he holds a mongoose, a goad, and an arrow.

original: g-yon gyi phyag dang pos rtsibs logs g-yon du gnas pa'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag dang pos rtsibs logs g-yon du gnas pa'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
translated: The first left hand embraces the wisdom consort who stands on his left shoulder.

original: gzhan dag gis zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sre mong dang / gzhu bkang ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed nas /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sre mong dang / gzhu bkang ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed nas /
translated: In the others he holds a snake with a noose and a drawn bow.üîΩHaving generated oneself in that way, one should visualize his form in front and abide in that.

original: mdun du de'i sku bsams shing lhag par gnas nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgoms la /
analyzed: mdun du de'i sku bsams shing lhag par gnas nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgoms la /
translated: One should meditate on Great Vajra Holder on his crown,

original: de la rab tu bcug cing dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: de la rab tu bcug cing dbang bskur nas /
translated: and having caused him to enter and conferred empowerment,

original: rdo rje'i chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad blud par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad blud par bya'o //
translated: One should make him drink a hundred and eight times with the vajra water.

original: aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /

original: bar gyi man ngag dzam bha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: bar gyi man ngag dzam bha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The instruction in between is complete.
